Type.Name: DragBeginHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DragBeginHandler(object o, DragBeginArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DragBeginHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DragBeginHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DragBeginHandler is removed from the event.
